Question
========

What is the correct ordering, from widest to narrowest, of Ordinary, Bonferroni and Tukey intervals for differences between two averages in a situation with more than two groups? 
Answerlist
----------
* Ordinary, Bonferroni, Tukey
* Bonferroni, Ordinary, Tukey
* Bonferroni, Tukey, Plain
* Common, Tukey, Bonferroni

* Correct
